home.title: Ba da Ƙarfi Ta Hanyar Ilimi
home.subtitle: Gina Makoma Mafi Kyau

environment.title: Kare Duniyarmu
environment.subtitle: Kiyaye Muhalli
environment.description: Aiwa ayyuka masu dorewa da ƙoƙarin kiyayewa don kare tsarin halittu ga tsararraki masu zuwa yayin da muke ƙarfafa al'ummomin gida.

healthcare.title: Kula da Lafiya ga Kowa
healthcare.subtitle: Jin Dadin Al'umma
healthcare.description: Bayar da ayyukan kiwon lafiya masu mahimmanci da ilimin lafiya ga al'ummomin da ba su da isasshen sabis, tabbatar da kowa yana samun damar kulawa da lafiya mai inganci.

stories.title: Labarun Tasirinmu
stories.subtitle: Gano yadda muke haifar da canje-canje masu dorewa a cikin al'ummomi a duk faɗin duniya

cta.title: Kuna Shirye Ku Shuka Tsaba na Canji?
cta.subtitle: Ku shiga cikin al'ummarmu mai girma na wakilan canji kuma ku taimake mu wajen kula da bege a cikin al'ummomin da suka fi bukata. Kowane gudummawa, ko kaɗan, yana haifar da raƙuman canji mai kyau.

hero.subtitle: Kamar itacen baobab mai ƙarfi, mun gaskata da saiwa mai zurfi, girma mai ƙarfi, da tasiri mai dorewa.

mission.title: Manufarmu
mission.text: Kulawa da girma mai dorewa a cikin al'ummomi ta hanyar ilimi, ƙarfafawa, da kula da muhalli, ƙirƙirar canje-canje mai kyau mai dorewa wanda ya shafi tsararraki.
mission.description: Tun lokacin da aka kafa mu a cikin 2020, mun sadaukar da kanmu don ƙirƙirar hanyoyin magance masu dorewa waɗanda ke magance tushen talauci, rashin daidaito, da lalacewar muhalli.

values.title: Ƙimarmu ta Asali
values.subtitle: Ƙimarmu ta asali tana jagorantar kowane yanke shawara da muke yi da kowane aiki da muke yi a hidimar manufarmu.
values.growthDescription: Mun gaskata da kulawa da hanyoyin magance masu dorewa na dogon lokaci waɗanda ke ƙara ƙarfi yayin da lokaci ke wucewa, kamar itacen baobab.
values.communityDescription: Al'ummomi suna tsakiyar duk abin da muke yi. Muna saurare, muna koyo, kuma muna aiki tare don ƙirƙirar canje-canje masu ma'ana.
values.transparencyDescription: Muna kula da bayyana gaskiya cikakke a cikin ayyukanmu, kuɗinmu, da tasirinmu don gina amincewa mai dorewa tare da magoya bayanmu.
values.empowermentDescription: Muna ƙarfafa mutane da al'ummomi da kayan aiki, ilimi, da albarkatu da suke buƙata don bunƙasa cikin 'yanci.

timeline.title: Girma Tare Da Mu Tun 2020
timeline.subtitle: Daga farkonmu mai tawali'u zuwa tasiri na duniya, duba yadda BAOBAB HOPE ya girma kuma ya canza.

milestone1.description: Farko da hangen nesa don ƙirƙirar canje-canje masu dorewa

milestone2.description: Ya ƙaddamar da yunƙurin karatu a cikin al'ummomi 3

milestone3.description: Ya faɗaɗa don haɗawa da ayyukan kiyayewa da dorewa

milestone4.description: Ya gabatar da asibitoci masu motsi da ilimin lafiya

milestone5.description: Yanzu yana aiki a cikin ƙasashe 18 a kan nahiyoyi 4

impact.title: Tasirinmu Mai Girma
impact.subtitle: Lambobi da ke ba da labarin rayuwar da ta canza da al'ummomin da aka ƙarfafa.

team.title: Mutane A Bayan Manufa
team.subtitle: Haɗu da mutane masu sadaukarwa waɗanda ke jagorantar ƙungiyarmu kuma suna tura manufarmu gaba.

member2.name: Jean-Baptiste Dubois
member2.bio: Ƙwararre a fannin ilimi mai mai da hankali kan yunƙurin koyo na al'umma

member3.name: Sarah Chen
member3.bio: Mai kula da lafiya mai sha'awar kulawa da lafiya mai sauƙi

history.title: Tarihinmu
history.subtitle: Tafiyar BAOBAB HOPE daga ra'ayi ƙarami zuwa motsi na duniya

founding.title: Farkon Fata
founding.description: An kafa BAOBAB HOPE a cikin 2020 tare da hangen nesa mai sauƙi amma mai ƙarfi: ƙirƙirar canje-canje masu dorewa a cikin al'ummomi a duk faɗin duniya.

growth.title: Yin Tushen
growth.description: Daga farkonmu mai tawali'u, mun girma don yin hidima ga al'ummomi a cikin ƙasashe 18, koyaushe muna tsayawa daidai da ƙimarmu ta asali.

impact.title: Haifar da Tasiri
impact.description: Yau, mun canza rayuwar sama da 75,000 ta hanyar shirye-shiryen ilimi, lafiya, da muhalli.

cta.title: Ku Zama Wani Bangare na Tarihinmu
cta.subtitle: Ku shiga cikin dubban masu sa kai da magoya baya waɗanda ke taimaka mana rubuta bab na gaba na fata.

projects.title: Ayyukanmu
projects.subtitle: Gano yunƙuran canji waɗanda ke haifar da canje-canje masu dorewa a cikin al'ummomi a duk faɗin duniya.

education.title: Ilimi Da Karatu
education.description: Gina tushen ilimi waɗanda ke ƙarfafa al'ummomi don bunƙasa da girma cikin hanyar dorewa.

environment.title: Kiyaye Muhalli
environment.description: Kare da maido da tsarin halittu yayin da muke koyar da ayyuka masu dorewa ga al'ummomin gida.

healthcare.title: Lafiyar Al'umma
healthcare.description: Bayar da ayyukan kiwon lafiya masu mahimmanci da ilimin lafiya ga al'ummomin da ba su da isasshen sabis.

water.title: Samun Ruwa Mai Tsafta
water.description: Gina tsarin ruwa mai dorewa da koyar da ayyukan kiyaye ruwa.

impact.title: Tasirinmu
impact.subtitle: Duba bambanci da muke yi tare

blog.title: Ci Gaba da Sabuntawa
blog.subtitle: Yi rijista ga wasiƙarmu don samun sabuntawa na baya-bayan nan

information.subtitle: Samu damar albarkatu, labarai, da bayanai game da ayyuka da tasirinmu

newsletter.title: Ci Gaba da Sanin
newsletter.subtitle: Samu sabuntawa da bayanai na baya-bayan nan

contact.subtitle: Tuntube mu. Muna farin cikin jin daga gare ku.

volunteer.title: Zama Mai Sa Kai
volunteer.description: Ku shiga cikin al'ummarmu na masu sa kai waɗanda ke yin bambanci

partner.title: Damarmakin Haɗin Kai
partner.description: Gano hanyoyin haɗin kai tare da mu don tasiri mafi girma

donate.title: Bayar da Gudummawa
donate.subtitle: Tallafin ku yana taimaka mana wajen ƙirƙirar canje-canje masu dorewa a cikin al'ummomi a duk faɗin duniya

hero.subtitle: Kowane gudummawa, ko kaɗan, yana haifar da tasiri na gaske

impact.title: Tasirinku
impact.25Description: Yana ba da kayan aikin makaranta ga yara 5
impact.50Description: Yana ba da tallafi ga ruwa mai tsafta na mako ɗaya ga iyali ɗaya
impact.100Description: Yana goyan bayan sabis na likita na wata ɗaya
impact.250Description: Yana ba da tallafi ga ilimin yaro na semester ɗaya

why.title: Me Ya Sa Za Ku Bayar da Gudummawa ga BAOBAB HOPE?
why.item1: Bayyana gaskiya 100% a cikin yadda ake amfani da kuɗi
why.item2: Tasiri kai tsaye a cikin al'ummomi a duk faɗin duniya
why.item3: Hanyoyin magance masu dorewa waɗanda ke ƙirƙirar canje-canje masu dorewa
why.item4: Sabuntawa na yau da kullum game da tasirin gudummawarku
